artist: Painter: After Salvator Rosa; Engraver: Richard Earlom; Publisher: John Boydell
description: Jacob being pushed by an angel; herd of cattle in background
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

on sheet in black: [Sal: Rosa pinx   R. Earlom fecit/ JACOB WRESTLING with the ANGEL/ From the Original Picture by Salvator Rosa,/ in the collection of his Grace the Duke of Devonshire/ Vol II No.3 Size of the picture 1F7 by 2F2 in height  John Boudell excud. 1766];  on sheet in pencil: [1-374]
title: Jacob Wrestling with the Angel
